Text: Back from a wonderful 14 days holiday in beautiful Spain (Andalucia) so got some catchin' up to do. Thank you so much, Claudia for all the goodies !

You're welcome! Hope you've enjoyed Andalucia's beautiful beaches and cities, and it wasn't so hot as usual in summer!!

ATWT's about to end, so I hope it'll have a great finale for all you great fans!!
We were in the vicinity of Marbella. Fantastic surroundings. And......35degrees not hot ? Well, my used-to-being-cold dutch body found these temperatures just about right ;)
